abilities.name: ASSIMILATE
abilities.description: When you gain control of a planet, replace each PDS and space dock that is on that planet with a matching unit from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: HARROW
abilities.description: At the end of each round of ground combat, your ships in the active system may use their Bombardment abilities against your opponent's ground forces on the planet.

abilities: During a space combat, hits produced by this ship and by your dreadnoughts in this system must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

base.name: Cybernetic Enhancements
base.effect: At the start of your turn: Remove 1 token from the L1Z1X player's strategy pool and return it to their reinforcements. Then, place 1 command token from your reinforcements in your strategy pool.
base.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the L1Z1X player.

omega.name: Cybernetic Enhancements
omega.effect: When you gain command tokens during the status phase: Gain 1 additional command token
omega.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the L1Z1X player

base.name: I48S
base.ability: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to replace 1 of their infantry in the active system with 1 mech from their reinforcements

base.name: 2RAM
base.ability: Units that have PLANETARY SHIELD do not prevent you from using Bombardment

base.name: The Helmsman
base.ability: ACTION: Choose 1 system that does not contain other players' ships; you may move your flagship and any number of dreadnoughts from other systems into the chosen system. Then, purge this card.
